Serialized Form

  • Package org.seaview.bayes

    • Class org.seaview.bayes.BayesClassifier extends Classifier<T,K> implements Serializable

    • Class org.seaview.bayes.Classification extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • featureset

          java.util.Collection<E> featureset
          The classified featureset.

        • category

          java.lang.Object category
          The category as which the featureset was classified.

        • probability

          float probability
          The probability that the featureset belongs to the given category.

    • Class org.seaview.bayes.Classifier extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • memoryCapacity

          int memoryCapacity
          The initial memory capacity or how many classifications are memorized.

        • featureCountPerCategory

          java.util.Dictionary<K,V> featureCountPerCategory
          A dictionary mapping features to their number of occurrences in each known category.

        • totalFeatureCount

          java.util.Dictionary<K,V> totalFeatureCount
          A dictionary mapping features to their number of occurrences.

        • totalCategoryCount

          java.util.Dictionary<K,V> totalCategoryCount
          A dictionary mapping categories to their number of occurrences.

        • memoryQueue

          java.util.Queue<E> memoryQueue
          The classifier's memory. It will forget old classifications as soon as they become too old.
